eu.amidst.core.utils

Class BayesianNetworkGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.utils.BayesianNetworkGenerator

  • public final class BayesianNetworkGenerator
extends Object
    This class defines a random BayesianNetwork generator.

      • generateNaiveBayesWithGlobalHiddenVar

        public static BayesianNetwork generateNaiveBayesWithGlobalHiddenVar(int nClassLabels,
                                                                    String nameGlobalHiddenVar)
        Generates a NaiveBayesClassifier with a global Gaussian hidden variable. The global Gaussian hidden variable is a child of the class variable and a parent of all the remaining variables.
        Parameters:
        nClassLabels - the number of states for the class variable.
        nameGlobalHiddenVar - a String that represents the name of the global hidden variable.
        Returns:
        a BayesianNetwork object.

      • generateNaiveBayes

        public static BayesianNetwork generateNaiveBayes(int nClassLabels)
        Generates a NaiveBayesClassifier.
        Parameters:
        nClassLabels - the number of states for the class variable.
        Returns:
        a BayesianNetwork object.

      • generateBNtoFile

        public static void generateBNtoFile(int nDiscrete,
                                    int nStates,
                                    int nContin,
                                    int nLinks,
                                    int seed_,
                                    String filename)
                             throws IOException
        Generates a BayesianNetwork then saves it in a file.
        Parameters:
        nDiscrete - an int that represents the number of Multinomial variables.
        nStates - an int that represents the number of states.
        nContin - an int that represents the number of Gaussian variables.
        nLinks - an int that represents the number of links.
        seed_ - an int that represents the seed.
        filename - an String that represents the name of the file where the generated BN will be saved.
        Throws:
        IOException - signals that an I/O exception has occurred.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] agrs)
                 throws IOException,
                        ClassNotFoundException
        Throws:
        IOException
        ClassNotFoundException
